summary: Expose the next retry delay field from ApplicationFailureInfo that was recently added to the API. This allows activities to specify custom retry delays on failure in the PHP SDK.
userImpact: SDK users can now specify custom retry delays when activities fail, providing finer control over retry behavior.
resolutionDetails: The ApplicationFailureInfo field exposing next retry delay was implemented in the PHP SDK.
keyQuote: We recently added the ability for an activity to specify the next retry delay on failure via a field on `ApplicationFailureInfo`.
